trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a password cannot be retrieved from the password store.
trans-unit.target: 当无法从密码存储区检索密码时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A description of the reason for the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> class and sets the <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> property to the supplied <paramref name="message" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> 类的新实例，并将 <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> 属性设置为提供的 <paramref name="message" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> class with the supplied serialization information and context.
trans-unit.target: 用所提供的序列化信息和上下文初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A description of the reason for the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> class and sets the <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> property to the supplied <paramref name="message" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> property to the supplied <paramref name="innerException" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipPasswordException" /> 类的新实例，并将 <see cref="P:System.Exception.Message" /> 属性设置为 <paramref name="message" />，将 <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> 属性设置为提供的 <paramref name="innerException" />。
